name: Maze Of Death (hamrath)
description:
Find your way through a dangerous maze where all walls are poisonous. To reach the exit you have to die - a lot! Luckily you can collect your dead bodies to get back your lost live and continue your search for the right way to the exit.

This is a Windows remake of my original C64 game from 2018, which you can find here. It has music and sfx and you can even use a gamepad. 

Any suggestions to make this a good game are appreciated!
